text: Amphisbaena mongoyo is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== mongoyo Category:Reptiles described in 2019 Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Taxa named by Mauro Teixeira Jr. Category:Taxa named by Francisco Dal Vechio Category:Taxa named by Renato Recoder Category:Taxa named by José Cassimiro Category:Taxa named by Marco Aurélio de Sena Category:Taxa named by Miguel Trefaut Rodrigues
title: Amphisbaena mongoyo
